item.title: Language
item.description: Grammar config = stmt* stmt = comment | sexpr comment = ';' [^\n]* sexpr = '(' literal arg* ')' arg = sexpr | literal literal = KEYWORD | ATTRIBUTE | STRING | NUMBER KEYWORD = 'dir' | 'file' | 'link' ATTRIBUTE = '@' [a-zA-Z0-9_-]+ STRING = '"'[^"]*'"' NUMBER = [0-9]+

item.title: Reference
item.description: Contents Concepts .tree files Paths Variables Builtin Variables root_dir File system entities file @contents @perms @template dir @perms link @soft @hard Concepts .tree files Paths Variables Variables may appear anywhere in a *.tree file and must be surrounded by %( and ). Variables are inserted using simple string substitution by a preprocessing step before code is interpreted. This means that variables are not part of the mktree grammar.
